Hi Jerry, 
I believe the page you are looking for is the Priority Based Budgeting Topic Page. On this page you will find all things related to Priority Based Budgeting on the Knowledge Network including all related articles, documents, and questions. In the documents and articles section you will find examples of Priority Based Budgeting and further explanations of how it can be applied. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/topic_documents/300/priority_based_budgeting
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.author: Cheryl Hilvert
answers.text:
Hi Jerry!  The Center for Priority Based Budgeting is a preferred service provider of ICMA's Center for Management Strategies.  There is also information on the CMS website at http://icma.org/en/results/management_strategies/leading_practices/priority-based_budgeting  and on the CMS Group page in the files section at http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/groups/kn/group_files/1302  .  You will have to register as a group member to get access to these files.
If you are interested, I am also happy to schedule a free personal webinar for you from the folks at the Center for Priority Based Budgeting.  It may be a good way for you to see their approach without having to wade through the copies of the presentations on the Knowledge Network, which don't always include all of the information.  You can reach me at chilvert@icma.org

author: Jerry Giaimis
text: Hi all!  I was recently perusing the ICMA website and came across a page that spoke of priorty based budgeting. During my review I came across a page that listed sample budget presentations from municipalities and counties that utilized priority based budgeting.  I found the page intriguing but can't seem to  relocate the page. Any help would be appreciated.
title: Priority based budgeting presentations.
